mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_member ( avatar_name, avatar_path, id, password, first_name, last_name, full_name, nickName, phone, rank_no, dept_no, reg_date, upd_date, reg_ip, upd_ip, country_name, country_code ) VALUES ( #{avatar_name}, #{avatar_path}, #{id}, #{password}, #{first_name}, #{last_name}, #{full_name}, #{nickName}, #{phone}, #{rank_no}, #{dept_no}, #{reg_date}, #{upd_date}, #{reg_ip}, #{upd_ip}, #{country_name}, #{country_code} );
